text: Endless Forms Most Beautiful is the eighth album by the Finnish symphonic metal group Nightwish. == Track listing == # "Shudder Before the Beautiful" - 6:29 # "Weak Fantasy" - 5:23 # "Élan" - 4:45 # "Yours Is an Empty Hope" - 5:34 # "Our Decades in the Sun" - 6:37 # "My Walden" - 4:38 # "Endless Forms Most Beautiful" - 5:07 # "Edema Ruh" - 5:15 # "Alpenglow" - 4:45 # "The Eyes of Sharbat Gula" - 6:03 # "The Greatest Show on Earth" - 24:00 == Personnel == * Floor Jansen – vocals * Tuomas Holopainen – keyboards * Emppu Vuorinen – guitars * Marco Hietala – bass guitar * Kai Hahto – drums * Troy Donockley – uilleann pipes, low whistles, bodhran, bouzouki, male vocals, backing vocals Category:2015 albums
title: Endless Forms Most Beautiful
